Education

  • 2017-Present. MS in Computational Media, University of California Santa Cruz
  • 2012—2017. BS in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics, Tennessee Technological University

Employment

  • Spring 2018. Teaching Assistant, Computer Science 5J, University of California Santa Cruz, introduction to programming in Java
  • Fall 2015—Spring 2016. Supplemental instruction leader, Computer Science 2100,Tennessee Technological University, Introduction to Problem Solving and Computer Programming
  • Summer 2017. Waterfront Director, Boxwell Scout Reservation Summer Camp
  • Summer 2016. Swimming Pool Director, Boxwell Scout Reservation Summer Camp
  • Summer 2013—2015. Waterfront Staff, Boxwell Scout Reservation Summer Camp
  • 2010—2015. Karate Instructor, Jack Scott United Karate Studio

Publications

  1. Cyril Focht. “An Exploration of Interactive Paradox”. Digital Games Research Association (2018).
  2. Cyril Focht. “Little Suzie: Exploring Game Mechanics as a Narrative Device”. 51st National Collegiate Honors Conference (2016). Student Poster Session.

Honors & Awards

  • 2017 Best student Poster, TTU College of Engineering Research Day
  • 2016 Rising Renaissance Engineer Spectrum Award, TTU Computer Science Department
    • Presented by TTU college of Engineering to students who express academic and extra-curricular achievement, and exhibit a passion for lifelong learning.
  • 2013 Eagle Scout, Boy Scouts of America
